title: Pixel Blacksmith v1.0.0 [APK]
description:
Pixel Blacksmith is a game about blacksmithing pixels! As all kinds of visitors come into your humble blacksmithing shop (there's even robots!), they'll want all sorts of items before they'll leave. Can you help them?

Features:
- No adverts, no premium currency, no permissions, no pay to win, no "Invite your friends"!
- 175+ unique items to be crafted!
- Advanced multi-stage crafting system!
- 50+ different traders on the market, each with unlockable tiers!
- 50+ visitors, each with bonuses for their preferred items!
- Advanced visitor demand system, so you'll never get the same request twice!
- Repeatable tutorial, and detailed help articles for every area!
- Unique art style!

Supported Devices:
- All Android versions from Ice Cream Sandwich to Marshmallow, and beyond.
- All phone & tablet sizes, from a tiny 3.7" Nexus One to a chubby 5.7" Nexus 6P, and beyond to the 10.1" Nexus 10!
- If you're feeling particularly crazy, it'll even run on Android TV!
- Google Play Services are optional.

Google Play:
- 2 Leaderboards
- 29 Achievements
- Cloud Saves

About Author:
Pixel Blacksmith is created and maintained by Jake Lee, a software engineer from England. If you've encountered a bug, or have an idea for a new feature, please mention it in a review and I'll reply ASAP. I don't bite!

Happy Blacksmithing, blacksmiths!

-----------

This is a TPB-exclusive version. If you want updates, or any future bugfixes, get the free, ad-free game at: 
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=uk.co.jakelee.blacksmith

-- Developer
